name: Tornado Frigate
description: The Tornado Frigate was mainly used in PvP combat. It\'s extra weapon slot made it more desireable for kiting opponents than previous frigate hulls.
obtaining: Can currently be claimed within the Demon Corps campaign mission. Mk ups can be found in lv 60+ Vsec and Frigate supply runs.
tips-builds: Fissure Torpedos, Infernal Gatling ray, and wave drivers were commonly used as the weapons of choice for the frigate. Net torpedos and Electric Rails were often added to temporarily slow down opponents.
author: Anonymous65
